revised_title: Exploring Sap Movement in Plants and Trees
tldr: Thomas Fairchild conducted experiments on different plants and trees to study the movement of sap. He discovered that by grafting certain plants, he could make barren trees fruitful and decaying trees healthy. This research helped to improve the understanding of plant physiology and contributed to the advancement of gardening and planting techniques.
